channel.title: [PI]Rapid hitting NPC
channel.description:
OK i'm pretty sure this can be done in NPChandler.java but I have no idea how to do it.
what I was wondering how to do was, how can I make an NPC hit rapidly, and--(optional/don't have to answer this) hit thru protect melle?
